page.shortlink: api a5 is path valid function
page.description: The A5_IS_PATH_VALID() function indicates whether a directory exists.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Path exists, .F. = Path does not exist. Character

argument.name: path_name
argument.description: The drive and path of a folder. Character

page.example:
? a5_is_path_valid("c:\temp") = .T. ? a5_is_path_valid("f:\temp") = .F.
if (a5_is_path_valid("c:\mydir") = .f.) then ' Path is not valid ui_msg_box("Folder missing", "The path 'c:\mydir' doesn't exist.") end if
